subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|木|卯|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} in oracle bone script and bronze inscriptions.

Later {{Han compound|木|丣|c1=s|c2=p}} in small seal script.

The glyph finally turned back to {{l|zh|木}} + {{l|zh|卯}} in the current form.
